flawed_nl_solution:
Two daughters planted 5*2=<<5*2=10>>10 flowers.
The flowers grew into 10+20=<<10+20=40>>40 total.
40-10=<<40-10=30>>30 flowers were left after 10 died.
The daughters put 30/5=<<30/5=6>>6 flowers in each basket.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
